title: Anton Chekhov: a writer's life
brief_description: Uses photographs, contemporary footage, and excerpts from his writings to present a portrait of the Russian dramatist and short story writer, Anton Chekhov. Includes scenes from his plays and stories performed by artists from Moscow Art Theatre and the Mosfilm Studios.
